title: Introducing: In Bed
content:
Trying to find In Bed’s Facebook profile brings up a variety of ‘One Direction In My Bed Now’ and ‘JLS In Bed’ pages, and of course my personal favourite, ‘One Direction? Why Aren’t You Naked In My Bed Now?’.

Putting aside the slightly worrying fact that the majority of these pages were probably made by 13 year old girls and back to the music…

Oakland duo In Bed are very much in the C86 legacy, especially the likes of The Pastels or The Shop Assistants; all drowsy guitars and dreamy female vocals. Between their two tracks, Happy and the self-titled number, Jordan and Brittney do more than enough to convince us of their potential. Check out both tracks below, and for godsake, don’t search for their Facebook page.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
